001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.net.URI;
007import java.time.Duration;
008import java.util.*;
009import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
010import java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool;
011import java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService;
012import java.util.function.Function;
013import java.util.function.Predicate;
014import java.util.function.Supplier;
015
016import javax.annotation.Nullable;
017
018import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.HttpExceptionFactory;
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.*;
020import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.*;
021
022import org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemUtils;
023import org.slf4j.event.Level;
024
025import dev.failsafe.spi.Scheduler;
026
027/**
028    <p>The ClientBuilder is used to configure and create an {@link ApiHttpClient}. As the ApiHttpClient uses a {@link HandlerStack stack}
029    of middlewares the Builder comes with methods to configure and attach new middlewares. Also it ensures that some default
030    used middlewares are instantiated at the correct location in the middleware stack.</p>
031
032    <p>The default middlewares and services are added as Supplier to be able to override the ones provided by e.g.: {@link #defaultClient(URI)}</p>
033 */
034public class ClientBuilder implements Builder<ApiHttpClient> {
035    public static final String COMMERCETOOLS = "commercetools";
036    static final String userAgent = "commercetools-sdk-java-v2/";
037
038    private URI apiBaseUrl;
039    private boolean useAuthCircuitBreaker;
040    private int authRetries;
041    private Supplier<ErrorMiddleware> errorMiddleware;
042    private Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware;
043    private Supplier<RetryRequestMiddleware> retryMiddleware;
044    private Supplier<QueueRequestMiddleware> queueMiddleware;
045    private Supplier<Middleware> correlationIdMiddleware;
046    private InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware;
047    private UserAgentMiddleware userAgentMiddleware;
048    private List<Middleware> middlewares = new ArrayList<>();
049    private Supplier<HandlerStack> stack;
050    private VrapHttpClient httpClient;
051    private VrapHttpClient oauthHttpClient;
052    private Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer;
053    private Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> httpExceptionFactory;
054
055    private Supplier<ExecutorService> oauthExecutorService = ForkJoinPool::new;
056    /**
057     * <p>Creates a default client builder</p>
058     * @return ClientBuilder instance
059     */
060    public static ClientBuilder of() {
061        return new ClientBuilder();
062    }
063
064    public static ClientBuilder of(ExecutorService httpClientExecutorService) {
065        return new ClientBuilder(httpClientExecutorService);
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specific or preconfigured {@link VrapHttpClient} instance. Uses defaults for
070     * the {@link HandlerStack}</p>
071     * @param httpClient the HTTP client to be used
072     * @return ClientBuilder instance
073     */
074    public static ClientBuilder of(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
075        return new ClientBuilder(httpClient);
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specific or preconfigured {@link ApiHttpClient} instance. Uses defaults for
080     * the {@link HandlerStack}</p>
081     * @param httpClient the HTTP client to be used
082     * @return ClientBuilder instance
083     */
084    public static ClientBuilder of(final ApiHttpClient httpClient) {
085        return new ClientBuilder(httpClient);
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specifig {@link HandlerStack}</p>
090     * @param stack the HandlerStack to be used
091     * @return ClientBuilder instance
092     */
093    public static ClientBuilder of(final HandlerStack stack) {
094        return new ClientBuilder(stack);
095    }
096
097    private ClientBuilder(final HandlerStack stack) {
098        this.stack = () -> stack;
099        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
100        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
101        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
102        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
103        this.authRetries = 1;
104    }
105
106    private ClientBuilder() {
107        this.httpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of(new ForkJoinPool()).get();
108        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
109        this.stack = stackSupplier();
110        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
111        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
112        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
113        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
114        this.authRetries = 1;
115    }
116
117    private ClientBuilder(ExecutorService httpClientExecutorService) {
118        this.httpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of(httpClientExecutorService).get();
119        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
120        this.stack = stackSupplier();
121        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
122        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
123        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
124        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
125        this.authRetries = 1;
126    }
127
128    private ClientBuilder(final ApiHttpClient httpClient) {
129        this.httpClient = httpClient;
130        this.oauthHttpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of(new ForkJoinPool()).get();
131        this.stack = stackSupplier();
132        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
133        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
134        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
135        this.authRetries = 1;
136    }
137
138    private ClientBuilder(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
139        this.httpClient = httpClient;
140        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
141        this.stack = stackSupplier();
142        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
143        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
144        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
145        this.authRetries = 1;
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * Ensures the order of default middlewares to create a {@link HandlerStack}
150     * @return HandlerStack supplier method
151     */
152    private Supplier<HandlerStack> stackSupplier() {
153        return () -> {
154            final List<Middleware> middlewareStack = new ArrayList<>();
155            Optional.ofNullable(errorMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
156            Optional.ofNullable(internalLoggerMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
157            Optional.ofNullable(userAgentMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
158            Optional.ofNullable(oAuthMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
159            Optional.ofNullable(retryMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
160            Optional.ofNullable(queueMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
161            Optional.ofNullable(correlationIdMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
162            middlewareStack.addAll(middlewares);
163            return HandlerStack.create(HttpHandler.create(requireNonNull(httpClient)), middlewareStack);
164        };
165    }
166
167    /**
168     * Ensures the order of default middlewares to create a {@link HandlerStack}
169     * @return HandlerStack supplier method
170     */
171    private Supplier<HandlerStack> oauthHandlerSupplier() {
172        return () -> {
173            final List<Middleware> middlewareStack = new ArrayList<>();
174            Optional.ofNullable(userAgentMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
175            Optional.ofNullable(correlationIdMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
176            return HandlerStack.create(HttpHandler.create(requireNonNull(oauthHttpClient)), middlewareStack);
177        };
178    }
179
180    /**
181     * deactivates the circuit breaker for authentication
182     * @return ClientBuilder instance
183     */
184    public ClientBuilder withoutAuthCircuitBreaker() {
185        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
186        return this;
187    }
188
189    /**
190     * activates the circuit breaker for authentication. Upon erroneous authentication e.g. the authentication
191     * middleware will open the circuit breaker and retry regularly.
192     * @return ClientBuilder instance
193     */
194    public ClientBuilder withAuthCircuitBreaker() {
195        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = true;
196        return this;
197    }
198
199    /**
200     * @param authRetries number of retries for authentication before giving up.
201     * @return ClientBuilder instance
202     */
203    public ClientBuilder withAuthRetries(final int authRetries) {
204        this.authRetries = authRetries;
205        return this;
206    }
207
208    /**
209     * @param stack {@link HandlerStack} to be used for the HTTP requests
210     * @return ClientBuilder instance
211     */
212    public ClientBuilder withHandlerStack(final HandlerStack stack) {
213        this.stack = () -> stack;
214        return this;
215    }
216
217    /**
218     * @param httpClient {@link VrapHttpClient} to be used for the HTTP requests
219     * @return ClientBuilder instance
220     */
221    public ClientBuilder withHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
222        this.httpClient = httpClient;
223        return this;
224    }
225
226    /**
227     * @param httpClient {@link VrapHttpClient} to be used for the OAuth requests
228     * @return ClientBuilder instance
229     */
230    public ClientBuilder withOAuthHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
231        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
232        return this;
233    }
234
235    /**
236     * @param serializer {@link ResponseSerializer} to be used for de-/serialization
237     * @return ClientBuilder instance
238     */
239    public ClientBuilder withSerializer(final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
240        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
241        return this;
242    }
243
244    /**
245     * @param serializer {@link ResponseSerializer} to be used for de-/serialization
246     * @return ClientBuilder instance
247     */
248    public ClientBuilder withSerializer(final Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer) {
249        this.serializer = serializer;
250        return this;
251    }
252
253    /**
254     * @param factory {@link HttpExceptionFactory} to be used for creating Exceptions based on response status code
255     * @return ClientBuilder instance
256     */
257    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final HttpExceptionFactory factory) {
258        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> factory;
259        return this;
260    }
261
262    /**
263     * @param factory function to create {@link HttpExceptionFactory} to be used for creating Exceptions based on response
264     * status code with the configured {@link ResponseSerializer}
265     * @return ClientBuilder instance
266     */
267    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Function<ResponseSerializer, HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
268        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> factory.apply(serializer.get());
269        return this;
270    }
271
272    /**
273     * configures the Factory for HTTP exception in case.
274     * @param factory {@link HttpExceptionFactory} to be used for creating Exceptions based on response status code
275     * @return ClientBuilder instance
276     */
277    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
278        this.httpExceptionFactory = factory;
279        return this;
280    }
281
282    /**
283     * configures an ExecutorService to be used for the Middlewares
284     * @param executorService supplier of the executor service to be used
285     * @return ClientBuilder instance
286     */
287    public ClientBuilder withOAuthExecutorService(final Supplier<ExecutorService> executorService) {
288        this.oauthExecutorService = executorService;
289        return this;
290    }
291
292    /**
293     * configures an ExecutorService to be used for the Middlewares
294     * @param executorService executor service to be used
295     * @return ClientBuilder instance
296     */
297    public ClientBuilder withOAuthExecutorService(final ExecutorService executorService) {
298        this.oauthExecutorService = () -> executorService;
299        return this;
300    }
301
302    /**
303     * <p>Configures a client with the default middlewares and the given baseUrl</p>
304     * <p>The following middlewares and services are configured:
305     * <ul>
306     *     <li>{@link ErrorMiddleware}</li>
307     *     <li>{@link ResponseSerializer}</li>
308     *     <li>{@link InternalLoggerFactory}</li>
309     *     <li>{@link UserAgentMiddleware}</li>
310     *     <li>{@link AcceptGZipMiddleware}</li>
311     * </ul>
312     * </p>
313     * @param apiBaseUrl base URI for the API
314     * @return ClientBuilder instance
315     */
316    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
317        return withApiBaseUrl(apiBaseUrl).withErrorMiddleware()
318                .withSerializer(ResponseSerializer.of())
319                .withInternalLoggerFactory((request, topic) -> InternalLogger.getLogger(COMMERCETOOLS + "." + topic))
320                .withUserAgentSupplier(ClientBuilder::buildDefaultUserAgent)
321                .addAcceptGZipMiddleware();
322    }
323
324    /**
325     * <p>Configures a client with the default middlewares and the given baseUrl</p>
326     * <p>The following middlewares and services are configured:
327     * <ul>
328     *     <li>{@link ErrorMiddleware}</li>
329     *     <li>{@link ResponseSerializer}</li>
330     *     <li>{@link InternalLoggerFactory}</li>
331     *     <li>{@link UserAgentMiddleware}</li>
332     *     <li>{@link AcceptGZipMiddleware}</li>
333     * </ul>
334     * </p>
335     * @param apiBaseUrl base URI for the API
336     * @return ClientBuilder instance
337     */
338    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final String apiBaseUrl) {
339        return defaultClient(URI.create(apiBaseUrl));
340    }
341
342    /**
343     * <p>Configures a client with the default middlewares and the given baseUrl</p>
344     * <p>The following middlewares and services are configured:
345     * <ul>
346     *     <li>{@link ErrorMiddleware}</li>
347     *     <li>{@link ResponseSerializer}</li>
348     *     <li>{@link InternalLoggerFactory}</li>
349     *     <li>{@link UserAgentMiddleware}</li>
350     *     <li>{@link AcceptGZipMiddleware}</li>
351     * </ul>
352     * </p>
353     * @param apiBaseUrl base URI for the API
354     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used
355     * @param tokenEndpoint token endpoint URI to be used for authentication
356     * @return ClientBuilder instance
357     */
358    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final String apiBaseUrl, final ClientCredentials credentials,
359            final String tokenEndpoint) {
360        return defaultClient(apiBaseUrl).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
361    }
362
363    /**
364     * <p>Configures a client with the default middlewares and the given baseUrl</p>
365     * <p>The following middlewares and services are configured:
366     * <ul>
367     *     <li>{@link ErrorMiddleware}</li>
368     *     <li>{@link ResponseSerializer}</li>
369     *     <li>{@link InternalLoggerFactory}</li>
370     *     <li>{@link UserAgentMiddleware}</li>
371     *     <li>{@link AcceptGZipMiddleware}</li>
372     * </ul>
373     * </p>
374     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used
375     * @param serviceRegionConfig {@link ServiceRegionConfig} to be used
376     * @return ClientBuilder instance
377     */
378    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials,
379            final ServiceRegionConfig serviceRegionConfig) {
380        return defaultClient(serviceRegionConfig.getApiUrl()).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials,
381            serviceRegionConfig.getOAuthTokenUrl());
382    }
383
384    /**
385     * @deprecated use {@link #withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials, String)} instead
386     * @param credentials OAuth credentials
387     * @param tokenEndpoint OAuth endpoint
388     * @return client builder
389     */
390    @Deprecated
391    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentials(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
392        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
393    }
394
395    /**
396     * @deprecated use {@link #withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials, String, VrapHttpClient)} instead
397     * @param credentials OAuth credentials
398     * @param tokenEndpoint OAuth endpoint
399     * @param httpClient HTTP client to be used
400     * @return client builder
401     */
402    @Deprecated
403    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentials(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
404            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
405        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
406    }
407
408    /**
409     * configure the client to use client credentials flow
410     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
411     * @param tokenEndpoint URI to be used for authentication
412     * @return ClientBuilder instance
413     */
414    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint) {
415        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString());
416    }
417
418    /**
419     * configure the client to use client credentials flow
420     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
421     * @param tokenEndpoint URI to be used for authentication
422     * @param httpClientSupplier {@link HandlerStack} to use for authentication
423     * @return ClientBuilder instance
424     */
425    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
426            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
427        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString(), httpClientSupplier);
428    }
429
430    /**
431     * configure the client to use client credentials flow
432     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
433     * @param tokenEndpoint URI to be used for authentication
434     * @param httpClient {@link VrapHttpClient} to use for authentication
435     * @return ClientBuilder instance
436     */
437    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
438            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
439        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString(), httpClient);
440    }
441
442    private TokenSupplier createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
443            final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
444        return new ClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(),
445            credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
446    }
447
448    /**
449     * configure the client to use client credentials flow
450     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
451     * @param tokenEndpoint URI to be used for authentication
452     * @return ClientBuilder instance
453     */
454    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
455        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
456    }
457
458    /**
459     * configure the client to use client credentials flow
460     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
461     * @param tokenEndpoint URI to be used for authentication
462     * @param httpClientSupplier {@link VrapHttpClient} to use for authentication
463     * @return ClientBuilder instance
464     */
465    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
466            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
467        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
468            createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
469    }
470
471    /**
472     * configure the client to use client credentials flow
473     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
474     * @param tokenEndpoint URI to be used for authentication
475     * @param httpClient {@link VrapHttpClient} to use for authentication
476     * @return ClientBuilder instance
477     */
478    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
479            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
480        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
481            createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
482    }
483
484    /**
485     * configure the client to use client credentials flow
486     * @param token {@link AuthenticationToken} to be used requests
487     * @return ClientBuilder instance
488     */
489    public ClientBuilder withStaticTokenFlow(final AuthenticationToken token) {
490        return withTokenSupplier(new StaticTokenSupplier(token));
491    }
492
493    /**
494     * configure the client to use anonymous session flow
495     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
496     * @param tokenEndpoint URI to be used for authentication
497     * @return ClientBuilder instance
498     */
499    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
500        return withAnonymousSessionFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
501    }
502
503    /**
504     * configure the client to use anonymous session flow
505     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
506     * @param tokenEndpoint URI to be used for authentication
507     * @param httpClientSupplier {@link HandlerStack} to use for authentication
508     * @return ClientBuilder instance
509     */
510    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
511            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
512        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
513            createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
514    }
515
516    /**
517     * configure the client to use anonymous session flow
518     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
519     * @param tokenEndpoint URI to be used for authentication
520     * @param httpClient {@link VrapHttpClient} to use for authentication
521     * @return ClientBuilder instance
522     */
523    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
524            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
525        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
526            createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
527    }
528
529    private TokenSupplier createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
530            final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
531        return new AnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(),
532            credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
533    }
534
535    /**
536     * configure the client to use anonymous & refresh token flow
537     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
538     * @param anonTokenEndpoint URI to be used for anonymous token authentication
539     * @param refreshTokenEndpoint URI to be used for refresh token authentication
540     * @param storage {@link TokenStorage} for the authentication tokens
541     * @return ClientBuilder instance
542     */
543    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
544            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage) {
545        return withAnonymousRefreshFlow(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint, refreshTokenEndpoint, storage,
546            oauthHandlerSupplier());
547    }
548
549    /**
550     * configure the client to use anonymous & refresh token flow
551     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
552     * @param anonTokenEndpoint URI to be used for anonymous token authentication
553     * @param refreshTokenEndpoint URI to be used for refresh token authentication
554     * @param storage {@link TokenStorage} for the authentication tokens
555     * @param httpClientSupplier {@link HandlerStack} to be used for authentication
556     * @return ClientBuilder instance
557     */
558    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
559            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage, Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
560        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint,
561            refreshTokenEndpoint, storage, httpClientSupplier.get()));
562    }
563
564    /**
565     * configure the client to use anonymous & refresh token flow
566     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
567     * @param anonTokenEndpoint URI to be used for anonymous token authentication
568     * @param refreshTokenEndpoint URI to be used for refresh token authentication
569     * @param storage {@link TokenStorage} for the authentication tokens
570     * @param httpClient {@link VrapHttpClient} to be used for authentication
571     * @return ClientBuilder instance
572     */
573    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
574            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage, VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
575        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint,
576            refreshTokenEndpoint, storage, httpClient));
577    }
578
579    private TokenSupplier createInMemoryTokenSupplier(TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
580        return Optional.ofNullable(oauthExecutorService)
581                .map(executorService -> new InMemoryTokenSupplier(executorService.get(), tokenSupplier))
582                .orElse(new InMemoryTokenSupplier(tokenSupplier));
583    }
584
585    private TokenSupplier createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
586            final String anonTokenEndpoint, final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage tokenStorage,
587            final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
588        final RefreshFlowTokenSupplier refreshFlowTokenSupplier = createRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials,
589            refreshTokenEndpoint, tokenStorage, httpClient);
590
591        final AnonymousFlowTokenSupplier anonymousFlowTokenSupplier = new AnonymousFlowTokenSupplier(
592            credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), credentials.getScopes(), anonTokenEndpoint,
593            refreshFlowTokenSupplier, httpClient);
594
595        return new TokenStorageSupplier(tokenStorage, anonymousFlowTokenSupplier);
596    }
597
598    private RefreshFlowTokenSupplier createRefreshFlowSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
599            final String tokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage tokenStorage, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
600        return new RefreshFlowTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), tokenEndpoint,
601            tokenStorage, httpClient);
602    }
603
604    /**
605     * configure the client to use password flow
606     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
607     * @param tokenEndpoint URI to be used for password flow authentication
608     * @param email customer email
609     * @param password customer password
610     * @return ClientBuilder instance
611     */
612    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
613            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint) {
614        return withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
615    }
616
617    /**
618     * configure the client to use password flow
619     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
620     * @param tokenEndpoint URI to be used for password flow authentication
621     * @param email customer email
622     * @param password customer password
623     * @param httpClientSupplier {@link HandlerStack} to use for authentication
624     * @return ClientBuilder instance
625     */
626    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
627            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
628        return withTokenSupplier(
629            () -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials, email, password,
630                tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
631    }
632
633    /**
634     * configure the client to use password flow
635     * @param credentials {@link ClientCredentials} to be used for authentication
636     * @param tokenEndpoint URI to be used for password flow authentication
637     * @param email customer email
638     * @param password customer password
639     * @param httpClient {@link VrapHttpClient} to use for authentication
640     * @return ClientBuilder instance
641     */
642    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
643            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
644        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
645            createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
646    }
647
648    private TokenSupplier createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
649            final String email, final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
650        return new GlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), email,
651            password, credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
652    }
653
654    /**
655     * add middleware to inject an <i>Accept: gzip</i> header
656     * @return ClientBuilder instance
657     */
658    public ClientBuilder addAcceptGZipMiddleware() {
659        return addMiddleware(AcceptGZipMiddleware.of());
660    }

744     * add middleware to retry failed requests

746     * @return ClientBuilder instance

748    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final RetryRequestMiddleware retryMiddleware) {
749        return withRetryMiddleware(() -> retryMiddleware);
750    }
751
752    /**
753     * add middleware to retry failed requests. By default, status code 500 & 503 will be retried. Between each retry
754     * an incremental backoff strategy is applied
755     * @param maxRetries number of retries before giving uo
756     * @return ClientBuilder instance
757     */
758    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries) {
759        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries));
760    }
761
762    /**
763     * add middleware to retry failed requests. Between each retry an incremental backoff strategy is applied
764     * @param maxRetries number of retries before giving uo
765     * @param statusCodes HTTP status codes to retry a failed request e.g. 500 & 503
766     * @return ClientBuilder instance
767     */
768    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes) {
769        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, statusCodes));
770    }
771
772    /**
773     * add middleware to retry failed requests. Between each retry an incremental backoff strategy is applied
774     * @param maxRetries number of retries before giving uo
775     * @param statusCodes HTTP status codes to retry a failed request e.g. 500 & 503
776     * @param failures {@link Throwable}s to be retried
777     * @return ClientBuilder instance
778     */
779    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes,
780            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
781        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, statusCodes, failures));
782    }
783
784    /**
785     * add middleware to retry failed requests. Between each retry an incremental backoff strategy is applied
786     * @param maxRetries number of retries before giving uo
787     * @param delay the initial delay for a retry
788     * @param maxDelay the maximum delay between each retry
789     * @param statusCodes HTTP status codes to retry a failed request e.g. 500 & 503
790     * @param failures {@link Throwable}s to be retried
791     * @param fn additional configuration for the {@link dev.failsafe.RetryPolicy} to be applied
792     * @return ClientBuilder instance
793     */
794    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
795            List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures,
796            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
797        return withRetryMiddleware(
798            RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
799                    .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes).andThen(fn))));
800    }
801
802    /**
803     * add middleware to retry failed requests. Between each retry an incremental backoff strategy is applied
804     * @param maxRetries number of retries before giving uo
805     * @param delay the initial delay for a retry
806     * @param maxDelay the maximum delay between each retry
807     * @param fn additional configuration for the {@link dev.failsafe.RetryPolicy} to be applied
808     * @return ClientBuilder instance
809     */
810    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
811            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
812        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn));
813    }

819     * @return ClientBuilder instance

821    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries) {

1044    public ClientBuilder withQueueMiddleware(final int maxRequests, final Duration maxWaitTime) {
1045        return withQueueMiddleware(() -> QueueRequestMiddleware.of(maxRequests, maxWaitTime));

1084    /**
1085     * add authenticator middleware
1086     * @param oAuthMiddleware {@link OAuthMiddleware} to be used for authentication
1087     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1088     */
1089    public ClientBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware) {
1090        this.oAuthMiddleware = oAuthMiddleware;
1091        return this;
1092    }
1093
1094    /**
1095     * add authenticator middleware
1096     * @param oAuthMiddleware {@link OAuthMiddleware} to be used for authentication
1097     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1098     */
1099    public ClientBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final OAuthMiddleware oAuthMiddleware) {
1100        return withOAuthMiddleware(() -> oAuthMiddleware);
1101    }
1102
1103    /**
1104     * use supplier for authentication tokens
1105     * @param tokenSupplier {@link TokenSupplier} for retrieving authentication tokens
1106     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1107     */
1108    public ClientBuilder withTokenSupplier(final Supplier<TokenSupplier> tokenSupplier) {
1109        return withOAuthMiddleware(() -> {
1110            final OAuthHandler oAuthHandler = new OAuthHandler(tokenSupplier.get());
1111            return Optional.ofNullable(oauthExecutorService)
1112                    .map(executorService -> OAuthMiddleware.of(executorService.get(), oAuthHandler, authRetries,
1113                        useAuthCircuitBreaker))
1114                    .orElse(OAuthMiddleware.of(oAuthHandler, authRetries, useAuthCircuitBreaker));
1115        });
1116    }
1117
1118    /**
1119     * use supplier for authentication tokens
1120     * @param tokenSupplier {@link TokenSupplier} for retrieving authentication tokens
1121     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1122     */
1123    public ClientBuilder withTokenSupplier(final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
1124        return withTokenSupplier(() -> tokenSupplier);
1125    }

1144    /**
1145     * @param internalLoggerFactory {@link InternalLoggerFactory} creates the logger for request & responses
1146     * @param responseLogEvent {@link Level} for logging responses.
1147     * @param deprecationLogEvent {@link Level} for logging {@link ApiHttpHeaders#X_DEPRECATION_NOTICE}
1148     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1149     */
1150    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory,
1151            final Level responseLogEvent, final Level deprecationLogEvent) {
1152        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(
1153            InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory, responseLogEvent, deprecationLogEvent));
1154    }
1155
1156    /**
1157     * @param internalLoggerFactory {@link InternalLoggerFactory} creates the logger for request & responses
1158     * @param responseLogEvent {@link Level} for logging responses.
1159     * @param deprecationLogEvent {@link Level} for logging {@link ApiHttpHeaders#X_DEPRECATION_NOTICE}
1160     * @param defaultExceptionLogEvent {@link Level} for logging errors
1161     * @param exceptionLogEvents {@link Level} for logging by exception class
1162     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1163     */
1164    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory,
1165            final Level responseLogEvent, final Level deprecationLogEvent, final Level defaultExceptionLogEvent,
1166            final Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, Level> exceptionLogEvents) {
1167        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory, responseLogEvent,
1168            deprecationLogEvent, defaultExceptionLogEvent, exceptionLogEvents));
1169    }

1179    /**
1180     * @param apiBaseUrl base URI for calling the API
1181     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1182     */
1183    public ClientBuilder withApiBaseUrl(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
1184        if (!apiBaseUrl.getPath().endsWith("/")) {
1185            this.apiBaseUrl = URI.create(apiBaseUrl + "/");
1186            return this;
1187        }
1188        this.apiBaseUrl = apiBaseUrl;
1189        return this;
1190    }
1191
1192    /**
1193     * @param userAgentSupplier user agent to be send with the requests
1194     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1195     */
1196    public ClientBuilder withUserAgentSupplier(final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier) {
1197        return withUserAgentMiddleware(new UserAgentMiddleware(userAgentSupplier.get()));
1198    }
1199
1200    private ClientBuilder withUserAgentMiddleware(final UserAgentMiddleware userAgentMiddleware) {
1201        this.userAgentMiddleware = userAgentMiddleware;
1202        return this;
1203    }
1204
1205    /**
1206     * @param correlationIdProvider provider to create correlation IDs for each request
1207     * @param replace replace any existing correlation id provider
1208     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1209     */
1210    public ClientBuilder addCorrelationIdProvider(final @Nullable CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider,
1211            final boolean replace) {
1212        if (!replace && correlationIdMiddleware != null) {
1213            return this;
1214        }
1215        if (correlationIdProvider != null) {
1216            correlationIdMiddleware = () -> (request, next) -> {
1217                if (request.getHeaders().getFirst(ApiHttpHeaders.X_CORRELATION_ID) != null) {
1218                    return next.apply(request);
1219                }
1220                return next.apply(
1221                    request.withHeader(ApiHttpHeaders.X_CORRELATION_ID, correlationIdProvider.getCorrelationId()));
1222            };
1223        }
1224        return this;
1225    }
1226
1227    /**
1228     * @param correlationIdProvider provider to create correlation IDs for each request
1229     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1230     */
1231    public ClientBuilder addCorrelationIdProvider(final @Nullable CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
1232        return addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider, true);
1233    }
1234
1235    /**
1236     * sets the middlewares to be configured for the client.
1237     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
1238     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1239     */
1240    public ClientBuilder withMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
1241        this.middlewares = new ArrayList<>(middlewares);
1242        return this;
1243    }
1244
1245    /**
1246     * sets the middlewares to be configured for the client.
1247     * @param middleware {@link Middleware} instance
1248     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
1249     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1250     */
1251    public ClientBuilder withMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
1252        this.middlewares = new ArrayList<>(Collections.singletonList(middleware));
1253        if (middlewares.length > 0) {
1254            this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
1255        }
1256        return this;
1257    }
1258
1259    /**
1260     * adds the middlewares to be configured for the client.
1261     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
1262     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1263     */
1264    public ClientBuilder addMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
1265        this.middlewares.addAll(middlewares);
1266        return this;
1267    }
1268
1269    /**
1270     * adds the middlewares to be configured for the client.
1271     * @param middleware {@link Middleware} instance
1272     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
1273     * @return ClientBuilder instance
1274     */
1275    public ClientBuilder addMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
1276        this.middlewares.add(middleware);
1277        if (middlewares.length > 0) {
1278            this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
1279        }
1280        return this;
1281    }
1282
1283    /**
1284     * build the {@link ApiHttpClient} with the configured values
1285     * @return {@link ApiHttpClient}
1286     */
1287    public ApiHttpClient build() {
1288        return ApiHttpClient.of(requireNonNull(apiBaseUrl), requireNonNull(stack.get()),
1289            requireNonNull(serializer.get()));
1290    }
1291
1292    /**
1293     * default user agent provider
1294     * @return user agent string
1295     */
1296    public static String buildDefaultUserAgent() {
1297        String runtimeVersion = SystemUtils.JAVA_RUNTIME_VERSION;
1298        String osName = SystemUtils.OS_NAME;
1299        String osArch = SystemUtils.OS_ARCH;
1300        String sdkVersion = BuildInfo.VERSION;
1301        return userAgent + sdkVersion + " " + " Java/" + runtimeVersion + " (" + osName + "; " + osArch + ")";
1302    }
1303}
